site_name: NATURAL HISTORY EDUCATION CO OF MIDSOUTH

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:35pm-3:05pm on
October 18, 2022.
Inspector called and texted licensee. A voicemail message was left at cell phone number. Licensee responded to text.
Neither licensee or wife would be back/available to do an inspection today before dark.
End Section
